org.hibernate.tool.schema.spi

Interface SchemaCreator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SchemaCreatorImpl

    public interface SchemaCreator
    Service delegate for handling schema creation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doCreation(Metadata metadata, boolean createNamespaces, Dialect dialect, List<Target> targets)
      Perform the creation to the specified targets

      Perform the creation to the specified targets

    • Method Detail

      • doCreation

        void doCreation(Metadata metadata,
                boolean createNamespaces,
                Target... targets)
         throws SchemaManagementException
        Perform the creation to the specified targets
        Parameters:
        metadata - The "compiled" mapping metadata.
        createNamespaces - Should the schema(s)/catalog(s) actually be created as well (CREATE SCHEMA)?
        targets - The targets for creation
        Throws:
        SchemaManagementException - Indicates a problem processing the creation

      • doCreation

        void doCreation(Metadata metadata,
                boolean createNamespaces,
                Dialect dialect,
                Target... targets)
         throws SchemaManagementException
        Perform the creation to the specified targets
        Parameters:
        metadata - The "compiled" mapping metadata.
        createNamespaces - Should the schema(s)/catalog(s) actually be created as well (CREATE SCHEMA)?
        dialect - Allow explicitly passing the Dialect to use.
        targets - The targets for creation
        Throws:
        SchemaManagementException - Indicates a problem processing the creation
